mapper.update: update order set pet_id = #{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ship_date = #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complete = #{complete,jdbcType=BIT} where o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select o_id, pet_id, quantity, ship_date, status, complete from order
